name: Traffic Dodger
description:
The goal of Traffic Dodger is to dodge incoming traffic and to get as far as possible with an increasing difficulty! You can switch lanes by swiping (mobile) or using A/D (keyboard). How far can you make it?

Controls

PC: A/D or Arrow keys Left/Right
Mobile: Swipe left/right

Future content

In the future the game may receive more updates adding new features such as:
- Improved ambient sounds & music
- Leaderboards
- More different environments

(Please note I work on this project in my free time and I do not guarantee that I will implement the features above. However when I have time and motivation these are the first features I will be working on for this project)

Assets by Broken Vector and BOXOPHOBIC
